instruction: Write a NASM x86-64 Linux program that exits with code 0.
reference_solution:
global _start
section .text
_start:
    mov rax, 60
    xor rdi, rdi
    syscall

instruction: Write a NASM x86-64 Linux program that prints "Hello, World!" followed by a newline to stdout.
reference_solution:
global _start
section .data
    msg db 'Hello, World!', 10
    len equ $ - msg
section .text
_start:
    mov rax, 1
    mov rdi, 1
    mov rsi, msg
    mov rdx, len
    syscall
    mov rax, 60
    xor rdi, rdi
    syscall

    mov rbx, 2
    div rbx

    syscall

    syscall

instruction: Write a NASM x86-64 Linux program that uses a loop to compute the sum of integers from 1 to 5 (result: 15) and exits with that sum as the exit code.
reference_solution:
global _start
section .text
_start:
    xor rax, rax
    mov rcx, 5
.loop:
    add rax, rcx
    dec rcx
    jnz .loop
    mov rdi, rax
    mov rax, 60
    syscall

instruction: Write a NASM x86-64 Linux program that computes gcd(48, 18) using the Euclidean algorithm with the div instruction and exits with the result (6) as the exit code.
reference_solution:
global _start
section .text
_start:
    mov rax, 48
    mov rbx, 18
.gcd:
    xor rdx, rdx
    div rbx
    mov rax, rbx
    mov rbx, rdx
    test rbx, rbx
    jnz .gcd
    mov rdi, rax
    mov rax, 60
    syscall

instruction: Write a NASM x86-64 Linux program that counts how many integers from 1 to 20 are exactly divisible by 3 (result: 6) using a loop with div and exits with the count as the exit code.
reference_solution:
global _start
section .text
_start:
    xor rbx, rbx
    mov rcx, 1
.loop:
    cmp rcx, 20
    jg .done
    mov rax, rcx
    xor rdx, rdx
    mov r8, 3
    div r8
    test rdx, rdx
    jnz .next
    inc rbx
.next:
    inc rcx
    jmp .loop
.done:
    mov rdi, rbx
    mov rax, 60
    syscall

instruction: Write a NASM x86-64 Linux program that counts the number of Collatz steps to reach 1 starting from 6 (sequence: 6,3,10,5,16,8,4,2,1 = 8 steps) and exits with the step count (8) as the exit code.
reference_solution:
global _start
section .text
_start:
    mov rax, 6
    xor rcx, rcx
.loop:
    cmp rax, 1
    je .done
    inc rcx
    test rax, 1
    jz .even
    imul rax, rax, 3
    inc rax
    jmp .loop
.even:
    shr rax, 1
    jmp .loop
.done:
    mov rdi, rcx
    mov rax, 60
    syscall
